pathAssistantSteps.info:
Next Steps:

  • Candidates will be applying
  • They will be receiving an email to answer Qualifying Questions per Experience site
  • You the recruiter will get a notification for every Candidate that has answered the Questions for you to review

Verifications Email Sent to Candidate

Recruiter Actions:

  • Await feedback
  • Once feedback is received move to next round if positive

Actions for Hiring Manager

  • Please review all Applications
  • Select which candidates you want to interview on the "Select Candidates" Component
pathAssistantSteps.picklistValueName: Candidates to be reviewed by Hiring Manager

pathAssistantSteps.info:
Actions for Hiring Manager/ Recruiter

  • Select Successful candidates from "Select Candidates" Component, these candidadate/s will go through to the next round - Background checks

Next Steps:

  • Review all Applications that are in "Review candidate for Manager" Status
    • On Application - Choose "Recruiter Review" option
  • Once you are happy with sufficient candidates to be sent to Hiring Manager, check the "Send Applications to Hiring Manager" field
  • An AI Generated Email will be generated, you are to read through, edit where applicable and send
